alert.note: Alert for Benton; Jasper; Lake; Newton; Porter (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 26 at 9:09PM EST until January 27 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible due to a combination of recent rain, snowmelt, and heavy river ice. * WHERE...Portions of northern and central Illinois and northwest Indiana. * WHEN...Through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Poor drainage areas may become inundated. Storm drains and ditches may be clogged with snow and ice, causing flooding. Localized water level fluctuations may occur due to shifting river ice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Snowpack will continue to melt across the area and recent rainfall has added to the runoff due to frozen soils. No additional flooding expected in the short term where snow has completely melted. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: A Flood Watch means flooding is possible, but not yet certain, based upon the latest forecasts. Persons with interests along area rivers, creeks, and other waterways should monitor the latest forecasts and be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
